about_the_game:
Welcome to the devastated world of Path To Valhalla.


You´ll help Enki, a worthy ANUNNAKI from the Sirian civilation at Mother Earth, to find Anubis` lost child, named Kalilah. They will face one great challenge: to free all humans from the slavery by the hands of the Warlord Khao Rá. Who proclame him self to be, the true GOD of the new world.

FEATURES

  • Story Mode.
  • Arcade Mode.
  • Hack N Slash.
  • Advanced Combat System.
  • Intense Battles.
  • Local and On-line Co-op Gameplay.
  • On-line Multiplayer.
  • Character Evolution.
  • Build your own army along your PATH TO VALHALLA.


MEN HAVE FORGOTTEN THE DAYS OF THE DESTROYER. ONLY THE WISE KNOW WHERE IT WENT, AND WHEN IT SHALL RETURN.



40 STEPS TO VALHALLA

  • Collect the forty pages from Enki´s proverbs, lost over the years. To understand Kalilah´s past and about the ancient world´s devastation story.

STEP ONE


We SIRIANS are the conquerors of worlds, powerful beings capable of unimaginable deeds. We SIRIANS were at war, a war for the dominance of a planet named NIBIRU. For many centuries we fought. This war was waged between our greatest warriors and the IGIGI, inhabitants of NIBIRU. As always, with war came knowledge. We learned about the IGIGI and their planet. NIBIRU´s orbit enters a specific solar system every 3,600 years, and we were approaching that, as foretold in our history.

Our expedition’s to Mother Earth was formed by me, ENKI, known as the wise one; DEODAT, the forger; ELOHIM and GENESIS, the creators; And KHAO RÁ… who was to be our biggest mistake.

You will find all other steps during GAMEPLAY.

You´ll help Enki, a worthy ANUNNAKI from the Sirian civilation at Mother Earth, to find Anubis` lost child, named Kalilah. They will face one great challenge: to free all humans from the slavery by the hands of the Warlord Khao Rá. Who proclame him self to be, the true GOD of the new world.

movies.name: Khao Rá the God of the New World.

name: 40 Steps to Valhalla

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD A8, 3.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 or AMD R9 390 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the devastated world of Path To Valhalla. You´ll help Enki, a worthy ANUNNAKI from the Sirian civilation at Mother Earth, to find Anubis´ lost child, Kalilah. They will face one main challenge ahead: to free all humans from slavery by the hands of the Warlord Khao Rá.
